AuthorName.Content: H Zhang, J Wu, Z Wu, Z Chen, D Lin, J Chen, Y Zhou… - IEEE Transactions ;on …, 2025Decentralized applications (DApps) have long been sitting ducks for hackers due to their valuable cryptocurrency assets, exposing them to various security risks.
